headline: ‘An Outrageous Breach’: Iraq Reconsiders U.S. Relationship
abstract: The killing of General Suleimani, intended as a shot against Iran, could accelerate an Iranian objective: pushing the United States military out of Iraq.
lead_paragraph: BAGHDAD — American oil workers were fleeing Iraq on Friday, as fears grew of war between the United States and Iran. At sermons in the Shiite holy city of Karbala, worshipers chanted, “Death to America!”
keywords: United States Defense and Military Forces
